interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2Pcs Mascara Black Volume and Length 4D Natural and Long Lasting Lash Blast Mascara, 0.27 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2021/05/25
Store: Marine Forest
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.01 x 0.98 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843907382'}
Review Text: This mascara did not work for me. I tried it with a primer and without to see how it performed and both times it flaked with in 4 hours giving me raccoon eyes. I wanted to love it though because it is very pigmented and applied smoothly without clumps. Didn't work for me, but that doesn't mean it wont for others.
Review Title: Pigmented but flaked
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Huxley Secret of Sahara Clay Mask Balanced Blend 4.23 fl. oz. | Korean Clay Mask to Refine Pores and Absorb Excess Oil and Sebum | Made with Moroccan Rhassoul Clay Huxley {'Brand': 'Huxley', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Special Feature': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '4.23 Fl Oz', 'Product Dimensions': '2.68 x 2.68 x 6.97 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} This mask is one my favorite clay masks that I've tried. It so gentle on the skin and hardly any scent to it. It's not too thick and easily applied in a thin layer. It exfoliates well and leaves my face feeling clean and visibly brighter after the first use. I was also pleasantly surprised that my face didn't feel dry after and it actually felt moisturized. A little goes a long way and it's well worth the price. The packaging is beautiful and looks like a luxury item. This would make a great gift! Will absolutely be buying this again when this tube is finished. Visibly brightens my skin DEROL Eyeshadow Stick Sets 12 Colors，Long Lasting Glitter Eye Brightener Eyeliner Sticks,Cream to Powder Waterproof Eye Makeup,Eyeshadow Capsules Crayon,Shimmer Eye Shadow Pencils (12 Colors/Box) DEROL {'Brand': 'DEROL', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream,Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2.2 x 2 x 2 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '715962598334'} I was really excited to receive these little eyeshadows. They are small and compact, which makes them easy to pack and travel with. The colors are pretty and while not super pigmented at to begin with they are buildable and blend well. I tried them with eye primer and with out and they lasted the same for me. I will say I have oily eyelids and noticed that they don't last more than a couple hours.
I think these would make a great gift for adults, teens, or even younger kids who want play makeup. My daughters who are 6 and 7 found them one day and loved using them. They especially loved the blue and purple that they said made them look like a mermaid. They are super fun and priced fairly so I would say give them a try! Compact and easy application 2Pcs Mascara Black Volume and Length 4D Natural and Long Lasting Lash Blast Mascara, 0.27 Fl Oz Marine Forest {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.01 x 0.98 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843907382'} This mascara did not work for me. I tried it with a primer and without to see how it performed and both times it flaked with in 4 hours giving me raccoon eyes. I wanted to love it though because it is very pigmented and applied smoothly without clumps. Didn't work for me, but that doesn't mean it wont for others. Pigmented but flaked
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Continues to favor skincare, particularly clay masks for gentle exfoliation and brightening effects; has recently expanded into eye makeup, demonstrating interest in vibrant and playful options, though with a cautious approach due to mixed results.
  
- **Skin Type:** Sensitive skin, with a strong preference for hypoallergenic and non-irritating formulations across skincare and makeup products.

- **Key Features Valued:** Effective cleansing, moisturizing properties, and easy application remain crucial. The user values versatility and buildable quality in makeup, along with aesthetically pleasing packaging that is gift-worthy.

- **Consumer Behavior:** Shows a willingness to repurchase high-quality skincare items. While exploring makeup, the user is now more aware of product performance, particularly in regard to longevity and irritation potential. The exploration remains focused on compact and travel-friendly items that deliver fun and accessibility.

- **Satisfaction Level:** Generally high satisfaction with products meeting personal needs; however, recent experiences with makeup highlight a requirement for careful selection based on performance to avoid issues like flaking. This reflects a growing desire for products that balance fun with functionality.

**Trends:** A strong commitment to effective skincare rituals is complemented by an evolving approach to makeup, emphasizing practicality and enjoyment while being mindful of performance and skin sensitivity.
